content.text:
# 1941 New York Film Critics Circle Awards

7th New York Film Critics Circle Awards
January ?, 1942(announced December 31, 1941)
----
Citizen Kane
The 7th New York Film Critics Circle Awards, announced on 31 December 1941, honored the best filmmaking of 1941.
Winners
*Best Picture:
**Citizen Kane
*Best Actor:
**Gary Cooper - Sergeant York
*Best Actress:
**Joan Fontaine - Suspicion
*Best Director:
**John Ford - How Green Was My Valley
References
External links
*[http://www.nyfcc.com/awards/?awardyear=1941 1941 Awards]
